# Introduction to Shell {#shell}

## Introduction

## Directory

### Current directory

```{sh pwd}
pwd
```

### Navigate

```{sh cd}
cd docs
pwd
```

```{sh cd2}
cd ..
pwd
```

### View contents

```{sh ls}
ls
```

### Create directory

```{sh mkdir}
mkdir examples
ls
```

### Remove directory

```{sh rmdir}
rmdir examples
ls
```

## Files

### List files

```{sh ls2}
ls
```

```{sh ls3}
ls -a
```

### Copy files

```{sh cp}
cp index.Rmd home.Rmd
ls
```

### Rename files

```{sh mv}
mv home.Rmd homepage.Rmd
ls
```

### Remove files

```{sh rm}
rm homepage.Rmd
ls
```

### Move files

```{sh mv1}
mkdir examples
cp index.Rmd home.Rmd
mv home.Rmd examples.Rmd
cd examples
ls
```

### Print content

```{sh cat1}
cat style.css
```

```{sh head}
head style.css
```

### Create file

```{sh touch}
touch todo.txt
ls
```

```{sh cat2}
echo "hello" > file1.txt
```

## Word count

```{sh wc1}
# characters, words and lines
wc style.css
```

```{sh wc2}
# characters
wc style.css -c
```

```{sh wc3}
# words
wc style.css -w
```

```{sh wc4}
# lines
wc style.css -l
```

```{sh cleanup, echo=FALSE}
rm todo.txt
rm file1.txt
rm examples.Rmd
rmdir examples
```
